messages.subject: free pocket guide
messages.msgSnippet: Morning, I requested (and received) a free pocketguide to homeschooling from HEM (Home Education Magazine). It is terrific to give to all of those naysayers,
messages.messageBody:
Morning,
I requested (and received) a free pocketguide to homeschooling from HEM
(Home Education Magazine). It is terrific to give to all of those naysayers,
in-laws, outlaws, nosy neighbors, etc. Who just DON'T get it...

http://www.home-ed-magazine.com/ORD/mtrlst.html

I ask for and received 25 in two weeks, you can also download and print your
own if you choose at:
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com/ORD/prtpockt.pdf

I love hearing about all of these colleges! I went to Ohio University in
Athens, Ohio, smaller not that small but it was cozy.
elana
hs. ashley 13, jason 11, chloe 10, and Gavrielle 3 1/2
